rules.description: new function keys using capslock and numbers
Map Option+J/K/P to Mouse Scroll Down/Up/Click
Wezterm shortcuts Control + K/I page down/up
Chrome shortcuts previous/next tab  cmd+j/l ( open url with cmd+o)
Chrome shortcuts Control + J/L page down/up
ONLY Change left_control + up_arrow/down_arrow to page_up/down

manipulators.description: to_delayed_action is set to 400ms in karabiner.json
